title: Apple MagSafe Battery Pack can now charge your iPhone faster – Here’s how to update
content:
Apple released a new version 2.7 firmware update for its MagSafe Battery Pack that will charge your iPhone faster. It now offers 7.5W charging on the go, compared to only 5W before the update.

more…

The post Apple MagSafe Battery Pack can now charge your iPhone faster – Here’s how to update appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple released a new firmware update for its MagSafe Battery Pack that will now charge your iPhone faster.
